definitions.title: vb. Pi. denom.
definitions.body: (Gerber:130) come or be in front, meet;—[[קִדַּמְתִּי]] Jon 4:2, Ps 119:147; 3 pl. [[קִדְּמוּ]] De 23:5 +, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְקַדְּמֵנִי]] Ps 59:11; 3 fs. sf. [[תְּקַדְּמֶךָ]] Ps 88:14; 1 S.[[אֲקַדֵּם]] Mic 6:6; Imv. ms. [[קַדְּמָה]] Ps 17:3;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: meet, confront (with hostility) c. acc. pers. 2Sa 22:6, 2Sa 22:6.= Ps 18:6, Ps 18:9, Job 30:27, c. acc. [[פָּנׇיו]] Ps 17:13 of hostile approach to city (act.) 2Ki 19:32 = Is 37:33 (+ adv. acc.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: come to meet one (acc.) as friend, with ([[ב]]) sthg. Is 21:14, De 23:5, Ne 13:2, so, as worshippers (acc. of ´[[י]]:), Mic 6:6, Mic 6:6; c. acc. pers. + rei Ps 21:4, so Ps 59:11 Kt LXX Vulgate (acc. pers. alone Qr), acc. pers. alone Ps 79:8; acc. ´[[י]]: Ps 88:14, acc. [[פָּנׇיו]] (of ´[[י]]:) Ps 95:2, cf. [[חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת יְקַדְּמוּ פָנֶיךָ]] Ps 89:15 (viz., to join themselves to thee).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be in front, 1Sa 20:25 (rd. [[וַיְקַדֵּם]] for [[וַיׇּקָם]]) LXX Ew Th We Dr al.
be beforehand, c. [[ב]] temp. Ps 119:147; + inf. cstr. Jon 4:2; anticipate, forestall, c. acc. rei Ps 119:148.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תַּקְדִּים]] (We Now GASm [[תְּקַדֵּם]]) Am 9:10 calamity . . . shall not come in front about us ([[בַּעֲדֵינוּ]]).
Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הִקְדִּימַנִי]] Job 41:3 who has anticipated me [God]? LXX Me Bi Bu confronted me (rdg. [[וַיִּשְׁלָָם]] for foll. [[וַאֲשַׁלֵּם]]); Du [[יְקַדְּמֶנּוּ]] confronted him (the crocodile).
